text: Misaeri Kitemaggwa Kauma (15 August 1929 - 7 October 1997).Find a grave was an Anglican Bishop in Uganda in the second half of the 20th century.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1975/6 p540: London; OUP; 1976 Kauma was born at Namagoma, educated at Uganda Christian University and ordained in 1967. A former teacher, he was consecrated the Assistant Bishop of Namirembe in 1975.DACB == References == Category:1929 births Category:1997 deaths Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Uganda Christian University alumni Category:Ugandan Anglicans Category:Ugandan educators
title: Misaeri Kauma
